sentences: Työ on tärkeä osa monien ihmisten elämää.
Minulla on paljon töitä tämän viikonlopun aikana.
context: In Finnish, 'työ' is a noun that means work or job. It can refer to employment in general, specific tasks one has to do, or laborious activities. In the examples provided, it appears in its basic form ('työ') and partitive case ('töitä'), which is commonly used when talking about some amount of work.
